text:
Hi
I'm hoping get a property made based on last contact by
The property tracks which user had last contacted based on email, sms or call logged.
So created new custom property
Just I want a contact property under the contacts record
like last contacted property
 but it's HubSpot default property and only show dates
but I need the email, name, sms of last contacted
<https://files.slack.com/files-pri/T22MX8Z8B-F06JZHG5CJZ/image.png>
But create workflow but not sure how can i trigger the event

Could someone let me know how can I achieve this?
